tool_description: Current weather data API, and Weather forecast API - Basic access to the Weatherbit.io Weather API.
name: Weather
title: Weather

api_list.name: 5 day Forecast
api_list.description: 3 hour interval - 5 day forecast for a given lat/lon

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: I = Imperial, S = Scientific, M = Metric (Default)

api_list.name: Current Weather Data of a location.
api_list.description: Returns the current (most recent) weather observation of a given location

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: I = Imperial, S = Scientific, M = Metric (Default)

api_list.name: 1 Hour / Minutely Forecast (Nowcast)
api_list.description: Retrieve a 60 minute "Nowcast" for precipitation, and snowfall

api_list.name: 16 Day Forecast
120 Hour Forecast
api_list.description: Returns a forecast for up to 120 hours in the future (default 48 hours)

optional_parameters.name: units
optional_parameters.description: I = Imperial, S = Scientific, M = Metric (Default)

api_list.name: Severe Weather Alerts
api_list.description: Get servere weather alerts from local meteorlogical agencies (US, EU, and Isreal supported )
